content.question: A student has a <math alttext="1 gram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>1</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></math> sample of each of the following compounds: <math alttext="N a C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>NaCl</mtext></mrow></math>, <math alttext="K B r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>KBr</mtext></mrow></math>, and <math alttext="K C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>KCl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following lists the samples in order of increasing number of moles in the sample?

choices.label: <math alttext="N a C l is less than K C l, which is less than K B r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>NaCl</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mtext> </mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>KCl</mtext><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>KBr</mtext></mrow></math>

<math alttext="N a C l is less than K B r, which is less than K C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>NaCl</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>KBr</mtext><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>KCl</mtext></mrow></math>

<math alttext="K C l is less than N a C l, which is less than K B r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>KCl</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>NaCl</mtext><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>KBr</mtext></mrow></math>

<math alttext="K B r is less than K C l, which is less than N a C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>KBr</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>KCl</mtext><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>NaCl</mtext></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="K B r is less than K C l, which is less than N a C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>KBr</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>KCl</mtext><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo><</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>NaCl</mtext></mrow></math>

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
